articles.title: India 6 - 0 Japan Highlights Hockey Men's Asian Champions Trophy 2021 - India TV News
articles.description: India thrashed Japan 6-0 to confirm their place in the semifinal of the Hockey Men's Asian Champions Trophy 2021.
articles.content: Defending champions India confirmed their place in the semifinal of Asian Champions Trophy 2021 with a 6-0 win over Japan in their final group stage match on Sunday. India secured a win against Pakis… [+3110 chars]

articles.title: Wang Lei sells $1 million worth of Gucci products within 2 hours at Paris outlet - AsiaOne
articles.description: From seafood to branded bags, it seems there's nothing Wang Lei, aka "fish-selling brother" can't sell. Since the Covid-19 pandemic, the 60-year-old veteran getai entertainer has seen his fortunes turn after becoming a live streamer, where he's stated that he…
